title: Convergence of the Fourth Industrial Revolution and Mathematics: Project-Based Learning for Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics fundamentals and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Exploring the impact of 4th Industrial Revolution technologies on math education, with project-based problem-solving using AI, big data, and real-life applications

learning_goals: Learners can explain the connections between Fourth Industrial Revolution core technologies (AI, robotics, etc.) and mathematical concepts
Learners can complete PBL projects that solve real-world problems through data analysis and algorithm design
Learners can efficiently perform large-scale team assignments using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
